Our Work

HOW WE WORK

Our Proven Process

From initial consultation to scaling your content, we've got you covered every step of the way. Our structured approach ensures quality and results.

01.

Discovery Call

We'll dive deep into your brand, objectives, and audience to understand your unique needs and lay the foundation for a successful partnership.

30-45 min
Deliverables
  • Brand audit
  • Goal worksheet
  • Audience analysis
02.

Strategy & Planning

Based on our discovery, we'll craft a comprehensive content strategy and a detailed production roadmap tailored to your goals.

1-2 days
Deliverables
  • Content calendar
  • Style guide
  • Production timeline
03.

Content Production

Our expert team gets to work, producing high-quality, engaging content that's optimized for your target platforms and audience.

Ongoing
Deliverables
  • Edited videos
  • Graphics
  • Distribution plan
04.

Scale & Optimize

We analyze performance, gather insights, and refine our strategy to scale your content efforts and maximize your long-term impact.

Monthly
Deliverables
  • Analytics reports
  • Optimization plan
  • Strategy updates
FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Can't find the answer you're looking for? Reach out to our support team.

Our standard turnaround time is 5-7 business days for most short-form content. For larger projects like podcast editing, timelines are discussed and agreed upon during the initial strategy call. We also offer expedited services for urgent requests.
We believe in a collaborative process. Each project includes two rounds of revisions to ensure you're 100% satisfied with the final product. We use a streamlined feedback tool that makes it easy to leave precise comments directly on the content.
To start, we'll need your raw footage or audio files, a brief outlining your goals, any brand guidelines you have, and examples of content you like. Don't worry, we'll guide you through this with a simple onboarding questionnaire.
We deliver in all standard formats optimized for social media platforms (e.g., MP4 for video, MP3 for audio). If you have specific requirements for your website or other platforms, just let us know, and we'll accommodate them.
You do! Upon final payment, you receive full ownership and rights to the content we create for you. You are free to use it however and wherever you see fit.
